name: Iron Man
description: Tony Stark, a billionaire industrialist, is captured by terrorists and builds a high-tech suit to escape, transforming into Iron Man.
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Jeff Bridges

name: The Incredible Hulk
description: Bruce Banner seeks a cure for his gamma-radiation affliction, but a new monstrous threat forces him to unleash the Hulk once again.
cast: Edward Norton, Liv Tyler, Tim Roth

name: Iron Man 2
description: Tony Stark faces pressure from the government to share his Iron Man technology while battling a new enemy with ties to his family’s past.
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Mickey Rourke, Gwyneth Paltrow, Don Cheadle

name: Thor
description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard and must learn humility on Earth, where he discovers what it means to be a true hero.
cast: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston

name: Captain America: The First Avenger
description: Steve Rogers, a frail young man, transforms into Captain America and takes on the Red Skull during World War II.
cast: Chris Evans, Hayley Atwell, Hugo Weaving

name: The Avengers
description: Earth’s mightiest heroes unite for the first time to stop Loki and an alien invasion threatening the planet.
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth

name: Iron Man 3
description: Tony Stark faces a powerful terrorist known as the Mandarin, testing the limits of his intellect, courage, and identity as Iron Man.
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Don Cheadle, Ben Kingsley

name: Thor: The Dark World
description: Thor reunites with Loki to stop Malekith, a vengeful dark elf bent on plunging the universe into darkness using the Aether.
cast: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston

name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
description: Steve Rogers uncovers a deadly conspiracy within S.H.I.E.L.D. while facing a mysterious assassin known as the Winter Soldier.
cast: Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Sebastian Stan, Samuel L. Jackson

name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
description: The Avengers must stop Ultron, an AI peacekeeping program gone rogue, from destroying humanity with a global extinction plan.
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans

name: Ant-Man
description: Scott Lang, a thief with a heart of gold, dons a suit that allows him to shrink in scale but increase in strength to pull off a heist that will save the world.
cast: Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Michael Douglas

name: Captain America: Civil War
description: A disagreement over international oversight divides the Avengers, leading to a clash between Team Iron Man and Team Cap.
cast: Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr., Scarlett Johansson, Sebastian Stan

name: Doctor Strange
description: After a car crash ends his surgical career, Dr. Stephen Strange discovers the mystic arts and becomes Earth's protector against magical threats.
cast: Benedict Cumberbatch, Tilda Swinton, Chiwetel Ejiofor

name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
description: The Guardians grapple with Peter Quill’s true parentage as they continue their cosmic adventures and face new enemies and old allies.
cast: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldaña, Dave Bautista, Kurt Russell

name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
description: Peter Parker balances high school life with his new identity as Spider-Man under the mentorship of Tony Stark, facing off against the Vulture.
cast: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr.

name: Thor: Ragnarok
description: Thor must escape the planet Sakaar to save Asgard from Hela, the goddess of death. He teams up with the Hulk in this vibrant, humorous chapter.
cast: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Mark Ruffalo

name: Black Panther
description: T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king, but faces a powerful challenger to the throne.
cast: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o

name: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers and their allies unite to stop Thanos from collecting the six Infinity Stones and wiping out half of all life in the universe.
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Josh Brolin, Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson

name: Ant-Man and the Wasp
description: Scott Lang teams up with Hope van Dyne as the Wasp to uncover secrets from the quantum realm while facing a new foe: Ghost.
cast: Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Michael Douglas

name: Captain Marvel
description: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes as she uncovers her past and takes a stand in a galactic conflict.
cast: Brie Larson, Samuel L. Jackson, Jude Law

name: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating snap, the remaining Avengers rally together for a final stand to undo Thanos' destruction and restore balance.
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth

name: Spider-Man: Far From Home
description: Peter Parker goes on a school trip to Europe, but his vacation is interrupted by mysterious elemental creatures and the enigmatic Mysterio.
cast: Tom Holland, Jake Gyllenhaal, Zendaya, Samuel L. Jackson

name: Black Widow
description: Natasha Romanoff confronts the dark parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy tied to her past surfaces after Civil War.
cast: Scarlett Johansson, Florence Pugh, David Harbour

name: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
description: Martial artist Shang-Chi is forced to confront his past and his father, the leader of a legendary organization wielding magical ten rings.
cast: Simu Liu, Awkwafina, Tony Leung

name: Eternals
description: A race of immortal beings reunites to protect Earth from the monstrous Deviants and confront their cosmic purpose.
cast: Gemma Chan, Richard Madden, Angelina Jolie, Salma Hayek

name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker seeks Doctor Strange’s help to restore his secret identity, triggering a multiverse collision of past villains and heroes.
cast: Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch, Tobey Maguire, Andrew Garfield

name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Dr. Stephen Strange journeys through alternate realities with a young dimension-hopper, facing dark versions of himself and a Scarlet Witch gone rogue.
cast: Benedict Cumberbatch, Elizabeth Olsen, Xochitl Gomez

name: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg, and Jane Foster—now wielding Mjolnir—to stop Gorr the God Butcher from eliminating all gods.
cast: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Christian Bale

name: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: In the wake of King T'Challa’s death, the people of Wakanda fight to protect their nation from new threats and honor his legacy.
cast: Letitia Wright, Tenoch Huerta, Angela Bassett

name: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
description: Scott Lang and his family explore the Quantum Realm and face Kang the Conqueror, a time-traveling threat tied to the multiverse.
cast: Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Jonathan Majors

name: The Marvels
description: Captain Marvel, Ms. Marvel, and Monica Rambeau’s powers become entangled as they team up to save the universe from a powerful Kree warrior.
cast: Brie Larson, Iman Vellani, Teyonah Parris
